Subject: User Download Endpoint Protector Client Installation
Description: The normal login method to access the admin console 172.16.16.101 via https is possible. As a user, the client software cannot be downloaded via the web address because the web address is not accessible as a user.
What_We_Know__c:
19.05
- asked for more details since there was nothing specific in the description
- the customer is having trouble accessing ***/client.php/software to download the clients to install them for the end users
- asked them on what server version they're on so we can troubleshoot

20.05
- told the customers this is a deprecated way of installing the clients and we recommend downloading them from the UI
Next_Steps__c:
19.05
- waiting on the customer to provide further details

20.05
- waiting on the customer/ticket closure
Solution_Comment__c:
told the customers that downloading the agents from **/client.php/software is a deprecated way of installing the clients and we recommend downloading them from the UI.
I also sent them the manuals for the deployment types we have
